akn:section.akn:heading: Report on membership of Iran in international organizations

akn:content.akn:p: § 8773. Report on membership of Iran in international organizations Not later than 180 days after August 10, 2012, and not later than September 1 of each year thereafter, the Secretary of State shall submit to the appropriate congressional committees a report listing the international organizations of which Iran is a member and detailing the amount that the United States contributes to each such organization on an annual basis. (Pub. L. 112–158, title V, § 506, Aug. 10, 2012, 126 Stat. 1263.)
